languages.text: {n}Ксенос склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Почему же? Я передал приглашение — руками скота, что обретался на этом мире — и "избранник" послушно явился. Разве я погрешил против истины?"

{n}The xenos tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why? I sent an invitation — by way of the cattle that dwelt on this world — and the 'chosen' has so obediently appeared. How are my words anything but the truth?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Почему же? Я передал приглашение — руками скота, что обретался на этом мире — и "избранник" послушно явился. Разве я погрешил против истины?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why? I sent an invitation — through the means of the cattle that dwelt on this world — and the 'chosen' have come so obediently. How are my words anything but the truth?"

languages.text: {n}異種族は片側に首をかしげる。{/n}「どうしてだ？俺は招待してやってるんだよ…この星に住む家畜の代わりにな…この『選択』はすっと出てきただろ。俺の言葉は真実そのものだよな？」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why? I sent an invitation — by way of the cattle that dwelt on this world — and the 'chosen' has so obediently appeared. How are my words anything but the truth?"

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は片側に首をかしげる。{/n}「どうしてだ？俺は招待してやってるんだよ…この星に住む家畜の代わりにな…この『選択』はすっと出てきただろ。俺の言葉は真実そのものだよな？」

languages.text: {n}异形将头歪到一边。{/n}“这又怎么了呢？我借由居住在这个世界上的牲口发出了邀请，而这位‘神选者’就紧随其后而来。这还不能证明我所说的正是事实吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why? I sent an invitation — by way of the cattle that dwelt on this world — and the 'chosen' has so obediently appeared. How are my words anything but the truth?"

traits.locale_text: {n}异形将头歪到一边。{/n}“这又怎么了呢？我借由居住在这个世界上的牲口发出了邀请，而这位‘神选者’就紧随其后而来。这还不能证明我所说的正是事实吗？”

languages.text: {n}Le xénos penche la tête.{/n} « Pourquoi ? J'ai envoyé une invitation par le truchement du bétail qui vivait sur ce monde et "l'{mf|élu|élue}" y a obligeamment répondu. En quoi mes paroles seraient-elles mensongères ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why? I sent an invitation — by way of the cattle that dwelt on this world — and the 'chosen' has so obediently appeared. How are my words anything but the truth?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos penche la tête.{/n} « Pourquoi ? J'ai envoyé une invitation par le truchement du bétail qui vivait sur ce monde et "l'{mf|élu|élue}" y a obligeamment répondu. En quoi mes paroles seraient-elles mensongères ? »

languages.text: {n}El xenos ladea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Por qué razón? Usé al rebaño que puebla este mundo para mandar una invitación... y {mf|el "elegido"|la "elegida"} ha aparecido sin rechistar. ¿Qué iban a ser mis palabras si no la verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why? I sent an invitation — by way of the cattle that dwelt on this world — and the 'chosen' has so obediently appeared. How are my words anything but the truth?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos ladea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Por qué razón? Usé al rebaño que puebla este mundo para mandar una invitación... y {mf|el "elegido"|la "elegida"} ha aparecido sin rechistar. ¿Qué iban a ser mis palabras si no la verdad?».

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos neigt seinen Kopf auf eine Seite.{/n} "Warum? Ich habe eine Einladung geschickt – über das Vieh, das auf dieser Welt lebte – und {mf|der|die} 'Auserkorene' ist bereitwillig gekommen. Wie könnten meine Worte etwas anderes als die Wahrheit sein?"
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why? I sent an invitation — by way of the cattle that dwelt on this world — and the 'chosen' has so obediently appeared. How are my words anything but the truth?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos neigt seinen Kopf auf eine Seite.{/n} "Warum? Ich habe eine Einladung geschickt – über das Vieh, das auf dieser Welt lebte – und {mf|der|die} 'Auserkorene' ist bereitwillig gekommen. Wie könnten meine Worte etwas anderes als die Wahrheit sein?"

languages.text: {n}Zeno, kafasını bir yana eğiyor.{/n} "Neden? Bu dünyanın sığırlarıyla davetimi yolladım. Seçilmiş dediğin de davetime icabet etti. Hâl böyleyken dediklerimi nesi yanlış?"
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos tilts his head to one side.{/n} "Why? I sent an invitation — by way of the cattle that dwelt on this world — and the 'chosen' has so obediently appeared. How are my words anything but the truth?"
